rev.desc.rev.desc: AGMRQ10H43093
Smart Upgrade Utility I: Make smart upgrade utility for both classic and lightweight upgrade - part 1
Optimize SM Apps Upgrade Development: seperate multi-files to store signatures
Load signature files of pd
Optimize SM Apps Upgrade steps: allow not to execute purge manually
Dump upgradetoc records of pd to transfer.bin
Optimize SM Apps Upgrade steps: allow not to execute purge manually
Dump upgradetoc records of pd to transfer.bin
Update codes to build upgrade package to support 9.3x PD upgrade to 9.40
For pd build, build signatures and upgradeobjects
Update codes to build upgrade package to support 9.3x PD upgrade to 9.40
Refactor this RAD and invoke RAD: apm.upgrade.builder.pd, apm.upgrade.export and apm.upgrade.export.pd
Update codes to build upgrade package to support 9.3x PD upgrade to 9.40
Loop smpatches and compare with patches. If the record in smpatches doesn't exist in patches' dbdict, export it to new dta file.
Update codes to build upgrade package to support 9.3x PD upgrade to 9.40
Enable multi-language build for PD upgrade
Update codes to build upgrade package to support 9.3x PD upgrade to 9.40
For pd enabled records, remove non-pd signatures and add pd signatures and then generate new upgradeobjects
Update codes to build upgrade package to support 9.3x PD upgrade to 9.40
Export upginfo record of pd enabled to transfer.bin
